title: Total aid received by state of fragility
subtitle: Total aid received directly, which is the sum of country programmable aid (CPA), humanitarian and food aid, measured in constant 2016 USD. This is aggregated by fragility group, as defined by the OECD's State of Fragility (2018) analysis.
sourceDesc: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD)
